original_text: You were kind to Christians who were in prison. When people took away your own things, you still chose to be happy. You knew that you had something better that would belong to you for ever. 10: People who were enemies of these Christians had taken away the Christians' own things. But nobody can take away what God has given to Christians. God had forgiven these Christians because of Jesus' sacrifice. And he had given them new lives, with a new purpose. sentences.original_text: When people took away your own things
you still chose to be happy
You knew that you had something better
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 더 나은 것을 가지고 있다는 것을 알았습니다

sentences.original_text: that would belong to you for ever
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 영원히 당신의 것이 될 것입니다

had taken away the Christians' own things
what God has given to Christians
And he had given them new lives
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그들에게 새로운 삶을 주셨습니다

sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 항상 하나님과 함께 살 것이라는 것을 알았습니다
